title: Loan Origination System
description: A full-featured digital software that automates and manages the entire lifecycle of a loan
longDescription: This project involved building a highly scalable e-commerce infrastructure capable of handling thousands of concurrent users. The focus was on performance, accessibility, and a seamless checkout experience.
features: Real-time inventory sync across multiple warehouses
Custom checkout flow with multi-currency support

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: Mobile-first application designed to help users track workouts and monitor progress.
longDescription: A fitness-focused application that leverages local database storage and cloud sync to provide a consistent tracking experience. It features high-quality charting to visualize user progress over time.
features: Workout log with custom exercise creation

title: AI Workflow Dashboard
description: A centralized hub for managing automated AI tasks and complex resource interfaces.
longDescription: Designed and developed a sophisticated dashboard for managing distributed AI workloads. The challenge was to make complex system logs and status indicators easy to digest for non-technical stakeholders.

title: Creative Studio CMS
description: A bespoke content management system tailored for high-end creative agencies.
longDescription: A content-first CMS built to manage large video assets and complex portfolio layouts. It features a drag-and-drop editor and automated image optimization pipelines.
